title: Book Bite #2: Can You Get Ahead by Making Things Easier?
description:
Does life really have to be so hard? Not according to Greg McKeown it doesn’t. In “Effortless,” he says the path of least resistance is the one we should be on.
Episode Recommendation:
EFFORTLESS: Embrace the Easy Option
